verses.verse: It is reported <S%G191><s%> commonly <S%G3654><s%> that there is fornication <S%G4202><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, and such <S%G5108><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%> as is not so <S%G3761><s%> much <S%G3761><s%> as named <S%G3687><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> that one <S%G5100><s%> should have <S%G2192><s%> his father's <S%G3962><s%> wife. <S%G1135><s%>

And you are puffed <S%G5448><s%> up, and have <S%G2192><s%> not rather <S%G3123><s%> mourned, <S%G3996><s%> that he that has done <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> deed <S%G2041><s%> might be taken <S%G1808><s%> away from among <S%G3319><s%> you.

For I truly, <S%G3303><s%> as absent <S%G548><s%> in body, <S%G4983><s%> but present <S%G3918><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> have judged <S%G2919><s%> already, <S%G2235><s%> as though I were present, <S%G3918><s%> concerning him that has so <S%G3779><s%> done <S%G2716><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> deed,

In the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> when you are gathered <S%G4863><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> and my spirit, <S%G4151><s%> with the power <S%G1411><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

To deliver <S%G3860><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> an one to Satan <S%G4567><s%> for the destruction <S%G3639><s%> of the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> that the spirit <S%G4151><s%> may be saved <S%G4982><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Your <S%G5216><s%> glorying <S%G2745><s%> is not good. <S%G2570><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> you not that a little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leavens <S%G2220><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> lump? <S%G5445><s%>

Purge <S%G1571><s%> out therefore <S%G3767><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> that you may be a new <S%G3501><s%> lump, <S%G5445><s%> as you are unleavened. <S%G106><s%> For even <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our passover <S%G3957><s%> is sacrificed <S%G2380><s%> for us:

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> let us keep <S%G1858><s%> the feast, <S%G1858><s%> not with old <S%G3820><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> with the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of malice <S%G2549><s%> and wickedness; <S%G4189><s%> but with the unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread of sincerity <S%G1505><s%> and truth. <S%G225><s%>
I wrote <S%G1125><s%> to you in an letter <S%G1992><s%> not to company <S%G4874><s%> with fornicators: <S%G4205><s%>

Yet <S%G2532><s%> not altogether <S%G3843><s%> with the fornicators <S%G4205><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> with the covetous, <S%G4123><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> extortionists, <S%G727><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> with idolaters; <S%G1496><s%> for then <S%G686><s%> must <S%G3784><s%> you needs go <S%G1831><s%> out of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> to you not to keep <S%G4874><s%> company, <S%G4874><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man that is called <S%G3687><s%> a brother <S%G80><s%> be a fornicator, <S%G4205><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> covetous, <S%G4123><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an idolater, <S%G1496><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a reviler, <S%G3060><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a drunkard, <S%G3183><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an extortionist; <S%G727><s%> with such <S%G5108><s%> an one no not to eat. <S%G4906><s%>
For what <S%G5101><s%> have I to do to judge <S%G2919><s%> them also <S%G2532><s%> that are without? <S%G1854><s%> do not you judge <S%G2919><s%> them that are within? <S%G2080><s%>

But them that are without <S%G1854><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> judges. <S%G2919><s%> Therefore put <S%G1808><s%> away <S%G1808><s%> from among yourselves <S%G5216><s%> <S%G846><s%> that wicked <S%G4190><s%> person.
